name: baler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine for putting something such as hay (= dried grass) or paper into bales (= large amounts of a material that have been tied tightly together): The farmer was able to buy a new hay baler this year. A conveyor belt takes sorted material to a baler at the recycling centre. a cardboard/paper baler Related word
bale
More examplesFewer examplesHe lets the cut hay dry then, using his tractor to pull a baler, makes bales weighing roughly half a ton each. To cut energy costs, the association suggests using electrical equipment such as slicers and cardboard balers only during off-peak hours.They sell equipment such as tractors, harvesters, balers, and smaller hand tools.A farm worker injured his arm in a straw baler.Regulations prohibit under 18s from using dangerous equipment such as slicers, box crushers, and paper balers.
